mapper.update: update order_payments set order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, price = #{price,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pay_type = #{payType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, created_user_id = #{createdUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, created_user_type = #{createdUserType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, order_id, price, pay_type, created_user_id, created_user_type, created_at from order_payments
select op.* from order_payments op where op.order_id=#{param1}
